trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类用于存储和管理集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object represents the primary key of a record in a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象表示的数据绑定控件中的记录的主键。

trans-unit.source: In general, data-bound controls that display multiple records (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control) use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object to store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects for the records displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下，数据绑定控件显示的多个记录 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件) 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>要存储对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>控件中显示的记录的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class supports several ways to access the items in the collection:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类支持多种方法可访问集合中的项：

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Item%2A> indexer to directly retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from the collection at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Item%2A>索引器以直接检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>从集合中特定的从零开始索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A> method to retrieve an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A>方法来检索可用于循环访问集合的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items in the collection into an array, which can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A>方法以将项复制到一个数组，用于访问集合中的项集合中。

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定集合中项的总数，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: 用于填充集合的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> 对象的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class using the specified <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数初始化的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类使用指定<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects with which to populate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>用来填充集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象的数组，它从集合中接收复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified array to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 指定的数组中接收复制内容的第一个索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects, starting at the specified index in the array.
trans-unit.target: 将此集合中的所有项复制到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象的指定数组（从数组中的指定索引位置开始）。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the items from the collection into the specified array, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A>若要将项从指定的数组，从指定索引处开始将集合复制的方法。

trans-unit.source: The array can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 该数组然后用于访问集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: You must use a zero-based array for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你必须使用一数组从零开始的`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection to an array of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.CopyTo%2A>方法以复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>指向数组的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的项数。

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中项的数目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property to determine the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>属性以确定集合中的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property is commonly used when iterating through the collection to determine its upper bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>当循环访问集合以确定其上限时，通常使用属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>属性通常还用于确定集合是否为空。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A> property to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.Count%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合为空。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含集合中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象的枚举数。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" />-implemented object that contains all <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 一个实现了 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 的对象，该对象包含集合中的所有 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A> method to get an enumerator that can be iterated through linearly to access each item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A>方法以获取可以按线性方式循环访问集合中的每个项的枚举。

trans-unit.source: To access the item at the current position in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问的枚举器中当前位置处的项，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move to the next item in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将移动到集合中的下一项。

trans-unit.source: To move the enumerator to its initial position, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将枚举器移到其初始位置，使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: When you initially get the enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to move the enumerator to the first item in the collection, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 当你最初获取枚举数或使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将枚举器移到的第一项在集合中，必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 否则，表示的项<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是不确定。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to iterate through the enumerator created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何循环访问枚举数由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.GetEnumerator%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以修改集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsReadOnly%2A> property to determine whether the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsReadOnly%2A>属性来确定是否中的项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>可以修改集合。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false`, to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object can be added or removed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，以指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>中的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>可以添加或移除对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> objects themselves cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象本身不能更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> collection is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 集合是否已同步(线程安全)的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsSynchronized%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsSynchronized%2A>属性来确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>是线程安全的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property has been overridden to always return `false` to indicate that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is not thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此属性已被重写以始终返回`false`，则指示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象不是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsSynchronized%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.IsSynchronized%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> to retrieve from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中检索的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> object from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 从集合中获取指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 位于集合中指定索引处的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 使用此索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>从集合中使用数组表示法的指定索引处的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用索引器检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于同步访问集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 可用于同步集合访问的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.SyncRoot%2A> property to get an object that can be used to synchronize access to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.SyncRoot%2A>属性来获取可用于同步对集合的访问的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object itself.
trans-unit.target: 在此实现中返回的对象是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象本身。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.SyncRoot%2A>属性，请参阅<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=nameWithType>接口。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <see cref="T:System.Array" /> that receives the copied items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 从零开始的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />，它接收从集合复制的项。

trans-unit.source: The first index in the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" /> to receive the copied contents.
trans-unit.target: 用于接收复制内容的指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的第一个索引。

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from this collection to the specified <see cref="T:System.Array" />, starting at the specified index in the <see cref="T:System.Array" />.
trans-unit.target: 将此集合中的所有项复制到指定的 <see cref="T:System.Array" />（从 <see cref="T:System.Array" /> 中的指定索引位置开始）。

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Collections%23ICollection%23CopyTo%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class to copy the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> collection into the specified <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 此实现的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Collections%23ICollection%23CopyTo%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类中的项复制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>到指定的集合<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>指定索引处开始。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> can then be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>用于访问集合中的项。

trans-unit.source: You must use a zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the `array` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 你必须使用从零开始<xref:System.Array?displayProperty=nameWithType>为`array`参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 对象是否跟踪其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> is tracking its view-state changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 对象跟踪其视图状态更改；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23IsTrackingViewState%2A> property is used to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object is tracking its view-state changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23IsTrackingViewState%2A>属性用于确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象是否在跟踪其视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 此属性主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 的状态。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 对象的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A> method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23LoadViewState%2A>方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象。

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 对象的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the saved state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，它包含已保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A> method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> class to save the state of the object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray.System%23Web%23UI%23IStateManager%23SaveViewState%2A>方法是使用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>类以保存对象的状态。

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 标记开始跟踪并将视图状态更改保存到 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray" /> 对象的起点。

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray> object as part of the object's view state.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法以将标记开始跟踪并将更改保存到的起始点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKeyArray>对象作为对象的视图状态的一部分。
